content.description: Route starts off fairly easy with several good rest points, but gets harder after the 4th bolt. Above the 4th bolt, the feet get slippery.
content.location: Start is directly to the right of Gator, and it goes up on the right edge of the obvious orange stripe.

content.description: This short but sweet route starts up a vertical face beneath the steep bulge in the center of the Orange Wall. Rest up when you get to the ledge, then blast through 20 feet of power endurance climbing on incut, glacier polished holds. The top is a bit contrived since there are jugs nearly within arms length on both sides, but it's more fun if you stay centered on the bolt line. The onsight crux is finding the chalkless crimps over the bulge.
content.protection: 5 bolts, permadraws on top.  It is easy to climb Sun Kissed and step right to the Karnage anchor to set up a toprope.
content.location: Karnage is the route in between Sunkist and Green Tangerine.

content.description: This sweet sport route cruises up through a cruxy bulge at the third bolt.Â  Fun climbing.
content.location: This route is between "Karnage" & "Clockwork Orange" on the right side of the Orange Wall.

content.description: Starts with bouldery moves for first three moves and then turns to overhung jug hauling.
The climbing starts out tough and bouldery and quickly eases up after the third bolts to overhung and juggy. Stick clip recommended as the move to the first bolt is tough.
content.location: Farthest right route on the buttress.
